2025-07-19T18:52:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, some High Speed Rail train services on 20 July 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Mainland have been cancelled or had their departing station and destination changed due to adverse weather conditions. Cancelled train service: To Guangzhounan Station: G6582 / G6584 To Shenzhenbei Station: G5636 / G5638/ G5640 / G5642 From Guangzhounan Station: G6581 / G6583 From Shenzhenbei Station: G5637 / G5639 / G5641 / G5643 Departing Station/Destination Changed: G6048 (Arrive at Guangzhounan Station) G6047 (Departure from Guangzhounan Station) For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or the mobile app. You may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. You may also consider taking the East Rail Line to Lo Wu/ Lok Ma Chau or using other transport to enter the Mainland. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or mobile app and avoid coming to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-19T18:52:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月20日部分來往香港西九龍站及內地的高速鐵路列車車次取消或需要更改始發站及終到站。 已取消的車次: 前往廣州南站:G6582 /G6584 前往深圳北站:G5636 /G5638 /G5640 /G5642 由廣州南站出發:G6581 /G6583 由深圳北站出發:G5637 /G5639 /G5641 /G5643 更改始發站及終到站的車次: G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站) G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。您亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。 您可考慮乘搭東鐵綫經羅湖/落馬洲，或使用其他跨境交通工具前往內地。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 機場管理局 早上繁忙時段

2025-07-20T17:53:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to heavy traffic at the road section leading from Airport Road to Hong Kong International Airport’s Terminal 1 Departures Kerb, motorists are advised to use the drop-off area at the Airport’s Car Park 1. Members of the public heading to the Airport are advised to allow sufficient time for their journey and consider taking the Airport Express and buses.
2025-07-20T17:53:00.CONTENT_CN: 現時機場路通往香港國際機場一號客運大樓離港層落客區的路段交通繁忙，駕駛人士請考慮改用機場一號停車場落客區。前往機場的市民，請預留足夠交通時間，並考慮乘搭機場快綫或巴士。

2025-07-20T21:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Additional Airport Express service from Airport Station to Hong Kong Station will depart from Airport Station at 01:15 am, 01:45 am, 02:15 am, 02:45 am, 03:15 am and 03:45 am on 21 July 2025. Operating hours on other lines remain normal. As train service on other railway lines will end by that time, passengers taking the additional Airport Express service are advised to plan their connecting transport in city areas in advance. Airport Express service from Hong Kong Station to Airport/AsiaWorld-Expo Station remains normal with the last train departing at 12:48 am.
2025-07-20T21:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 機場快綫由機場站往香港站的加班車將於2025年7月21日凌晨1時15分、1時45分、2時15分、2時45分、3時15分及3時45分由機場站開出。其他鐵路綫維持正常服務時間。 屆時其他鐵路綫的列車服務已結束，乘搭機場快綫加開班次的乘客，請預先計劃到達市區後的接駁交通。 機場快綫由香港站往機場/博覽館方向的服務維持正常，尾班車於凌晨12時48分開出。

2025-07-22T10:47:00.CONTENT_EN:
As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, some High Speed Rail train services on 22 Jul 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and GuangZhoudong have been cancelled due to equipment fault in the relevant Mainland section. 

Cancelled train service:
To GuangZhoudong: : G6568, G6556
To Hong Kong West Kowloon: G6565, G6553

For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or on the mobile app. Passengers may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. Passengers may also consider taking the East Rail Line to Lo Wu/ Lok Ma Chau or using other transport to enter the Mainland. 

For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and avoid coming to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.

內地鐵路單位通報，由於相關內地段有設備故障，2025年07月22日部分由香港西九龍站前往廣州東站的高速鐵路列車車次取消。

已取消的車次:
前往廣州東:G6568,G6556
前往香港西九龍:G6565,G6553

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。乘客亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。乘客可考慮乘搭東鐵綫經羅湖/落馬洲，或使用其他跨境交通工具前往內地。

如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。
